page.title: 18TEIGNMOUTH BUS SERVICE
page.content: Teignmouth does not have a bus station building. However there are five bus stops near to each other around the Triangle, a place in the centre of town. There are eleven different bus routes from Teignmouth's Triangle to surrounding towns and villages. For example there are three different routes from Teignmouth to Newton Abbot. Twenty-seven buses leave for Newton Abbot every day between Monday and Saturday. There are five buses on Sundays and Bank Holidays. Teignmouth has a bus service carrying passengers from the outskirts of the town to the centre and back. It is possible to buy an "Explorer" ticket which allows you to travel anywhere in Devon. The cost for an adult is Â£2.50 and for a child Â£1.25. A family ticket costs Â£5.00.
